description: Mobile techniques used by MazarBOT, ATT&CK software S0303 v1.1
name: MazarBOT (S0303)

techniques.comment: [MazarBOT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0303) can intercept two-factor authentication codes sent by online banking apps.(Citation: Tripwire-MazarBOT)
[MazarBOT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0303) can send messages to premium-rate numbers.(Citation: Tripwire-MazarBOT)
[MazarBOT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0303) is delivered via an unsolicited text message containing a link to a web download URI.(Citation: Tripwire-MazarBOT)
